description: The path bends around the edge of the forest and leads south and
west, and far to the southeast you catch a glimpse of the river
Delimbiyr flowing slowly towards the forest. The trees to the
north ean east are still to dense and blocks your way.
50538.name: The Outskirts of {GA{grd{yee{gp {GF{gorest{x

description: It's really dark here, the old trees leaning over the path
effectively blocks out almost all light. The forest is really
thick on both sides of the path and there is no way to wander
off of the path wich leads east or west from here.
50587.name: Into the {gD{8ee{gp{8es{gt {GF{gorest{x

description: The path bends here and leads east and south. Gigantic old
trees lean over the path, but not so much that they don't
let light through. To the north and west the trees makes a
solid wall that blocks you way.
50526.name: A Well-traveled {yPath{x

description: It's really dark here, the old trees leaning over the path
effectively blocks out almost all light. The forest is really
thick on both sides of the path and there is no way to wander
off of the path wich leads west or north from here. Nearby to
the north the forest doesn't seem so thick, and you see what
looks like a small mountainside.
50588.name: Into the {gD{8ee{gp{8es{gt {GF{gorest{x

description: The path bends with the silent floating river and leads west
and north between the trees. Further north the river seems to
turn eastward again. The thick forest that lines the path seems
uninviting and dark.
50581.name: On a {yPath {xnear {cD{8e{Bli{wm{Bbi{8y{cr{x

description: Squeezing through the crack in the cliffside you enter a small cave.
There is not much light, but you hear sounds of something moving.
What could be hiding in here..?
50590.name: {8Og{yr{8e {rCave{R!{x

description: This large clearing lies deep in the darkest forest, surrounded
by dense ancient trees casting deep shadows. Although you'd expect
such a open place to be a little lighter than between the trees,
it is not... The area is barren and not much grow here and it has
as gloomy feel to it.
50559.name: A {wC{clearin{wg {xin the {gD{8ar{gk {GF{gorest{x

description: The path makes a turn here and leads north and east. To the
east the path forks into two paths. The sounds of the forest
are everywhere around you, and you sometimes spot animals
moving betweeen the trees.
50518.name: A {yPath {xinto the {GF{gorest{x

description: The broad path makes a big bend around a small lake here.
You can see the shimmering surface of the lake through
the trees to the south. The path goes on between the trees
to the east and west.
50532.name: A Well-traveled {yPath{x

description: The trail leads in a straight north-south direction through
the deep forest. Trees surround you on all sides and in the
deep shadows you hear the sounds of the wild animals who have
their home here. To the north the forest seems to become a
little lighter as you approach a large clearing.
50555.name: {gD{8ee{gp {xinto the {GF{gorest{x

description: The path makes a big bend here, going around the trunk of a
giant old oaktree, and leads west and south from here.
The sounds of the forest are everywhere around you, and you
sometimes spot animals moving betweeen the trees.
50512.name: A {yPath {xinto the {GF{gorest{x

description: The path bends around the edge of the forest and leads north and east,
and the busy Trade Way can still be seen through the bushes to the west.
50537.name: The Outskirts of {GA{grd{yee{gp {GF{gorest{x

description: This is a small wooden house inhabitet by a elven family.
It is sparsly decorated but looks very comfortable and
cozy. The people who live here most likely make their
living from hunting in the forest and a bit of farming.
50592.name: Within an {gEl{Gve{wn {RH{rome{x

description: The path leads east and west along the north bank of the river
Delimbiyr. To the east the river bends northward, and to the
west it bends south and runs towards the outskirts of the forest.
To the north the forest grows thick and dark.
50580.name: On a {yPath {xnear {cD{8e{Bli{wm{Bbi{8y{cr{x

description: The broad path makes a big bend around a small lake here.
You can see the lake through the trees to the west. The
path goes on between the trees to the north and west.
50530.name: A Well-traveled {yPath{x

description: You stand on the edge of a steep cliff, looking down on
the treetops below. A path leads north into the forest.
If you lean over the edge you can see holes carved in a
in the rock. They look like the could be used for climbing.
The holes are smooth and rounded from long time use, but
the moss growing in them suggests that they haven't been
used in a while.
50549.name: Atop a {rCliff {xin the {GF{gorest{x

description: The trail curves, leading east and south. The forest is dark
here and the trail is overgrown with bushes and it's hard to
make your way. The sounds of the forest are everywhere around
you, and you sometimes spot animals moving betweeen the trees.
50551.name: {gD{8ee{gp {xinto the {GF{gorest{x

description: This path looks well-kept, like it's cleared and maintained
on a regular basis. It makes a sharp bend here and leads south
into the woods or east into the southern end of a large clearing.
If you liten carefully, the sounds of civilization can be heard
from that direction.
50572.name: A {yPath {xthrough the {GF{gorest{x

description: The old trail leads in a straight north-south direction.
To south the trail makes a turn to the west, and far to
the north you see a cliff peaking up above the tree tops.
50545.name: A {GF{gorest {yTrail{x

description: The path leads straight forward in a east-west direction.
Gigantic old trees lean over the path, but not so much
that they don't let light through. To the north and south
the trees makes a solid wall that hinders you from leaving
the path.
50528.name: A Well-traveled {yPath{x

description: The path leads north and south along the outskirts of the Ardeep forest.
To the west you can see the Trade Way not far away and to the east a
wall of trees blocks your way.
50508.name: The Outskirts of {GA{grd{yee{gp {GF{gorest{x

description: The path bends with the river and leads west and north here. The
river flows silently into the woods here and on the east side of it
the forest continues. Far to the south, on the other side of the
river, you can see what can only be the Black Road.
50578.name: On a {yPath {xnear {cD{8e{Bli{wm{Bbi{8y{cr{x

description: In a small clearing under the dense trees lies an what seems
to be an old camp. You see the remains of a campfire and beds
made out of leaves surounding it. It looks abandoned and at
least a week old. The path continues to the east and west, and
to either side the path bends southward
50516.name: An {8Abandoned {rCampground{x

description: The path leads north and south along the outskirts of the Ardeep forest.
To the west you can see the Trade Way not far away and to the east a
wall of trees blocks your way.
50507.name: The Outskirts of {GA{grd{yee{gp {GF{gorest{x

description: The broad path makes a big bend around a small lake here.
You can see the lake through the trees to the southeast.
The path goes on between the trees to the south and east.
50533.name: A Well-traveled {yPath{x

description: The path makes a turn here and leads west and south. Birdsong and
the sound of numerous small and larger animals can be heard from
the forest near you.
50517.name: A {yPath {xinto the {GF{gorest{x

description: The path makes a turn here and leads off to the west and south.
In both direction the forest doesn't seem to be quite as thick.
50585.name: The {gD{8ee{gp{8es{gt {GF{gorest{x

description: The trail goes in a straight North-south direction through
the dense forest. You can hear the sounds of animals rummaging
about between the trees. To the north the trail seems to split
into two paths. It looks like its used regulary and is quite
broad and easy to travel.
50565.name: A {yTrail {xthrough the {GF{gorest{x

description: The trail bends and go on to the north and west. Far to the
north the forest seem to become lighter, but to the south
all you can see is dense forest.
50554.name: {gD{8ee{gp {xinto the {GF{gorest{x

description: You are in the outskirts of the Ardeep forest, near The Trade Way, which
lies to the west. The forest is light here, with only bushes and an occasional
tree, but to the east and north the forest is growing thick and lush,
but sparse enough to travel through.
50569.name: The Southern Outskirts of {GA{grd{yee{gp {GF{gorest{x

description: The path winds it's way through the dense forest, leading in a
general east-west direction. To the west the forest is lighter
as you reach the edge of the forest, but to the east there is
nothing but more trees.
50511.name: A {yPath {xinto the {GF{gorest{x

description: This large clearing lies deep in the darkest forest, surrounded
by dense ancient trees casting deep shadows. Although you'd expect
such a open place to be a little lighter than between the trees,
it is not... The area is barren and not much grow here and it has
as gloomy feel to it.
50558.name: A {wC{clearin{wg {xin the {gD{8ar{gk {GF{gorest{x

description: This is a small wooden house inhabitet by a elven family.
It is sparsly decorated but looks very comfortable and
cozy. The people who live here most likely make their
living from hunting in the forest and a bit of farming.
50594.name: Within an {bEl{Bve{wn {RH{rome{x

description: A broad path goes between the trees here, leading east into
Ardeep or west towards the outskirts of the forest. The path
looks well travelled and it's easy to make your way here.
To the north and south a thick wall of trees blocks the way.
50535.name: A Well-traveled {yPath{x

description: The small dirt road ends here at a gathering of larger homes. To the
north is a very prominent looking home, where two strong elven warriors
stand, suggesting that the village elder lives there. Two smaller homes
are east and west of here.
50575.name: A {yDirt Path {xthrough the Village{x

description: The trail makes a bend here, leading north and west. The forest
seems quite dark here, ancient trees lean hout over the path
casting deep shadows. You can hear the sounds of animals rummaging
about between the trees. There is no way of knowing what kind of
beasts are lurking in there...
50562.name: {gD{8ee{gp {xinto the {GF{gorest{x

description: This short narrow path leads between the clearing to the east
and the intersection to the north. The sounds of the forest
are everywhere around you, and you sometimes spot animals
moving betweeen the trees.
50520.name: A {gSmall {yPath{x

description: The faint trail leads away from the main path to the west,
going deeper into the forest. The forest is dark here and
the path is overgrown with bushes and it's hard to make
your way.
50544.name: A {GF{gorest {yTrail{x

description: The path bends around the edge of the forest and leads north and
east, and far to the southeast you catch a glimpse of the river
Delimbiyr flowing slowly towards the forest.
50539.name: The Southern Outskirts of {GA{grd{yee{gp {GF{gorest{x

description: Examining the strange bush closer you notice that it does not
actually grow there.. It has just been placed up agains the
cliffside. When you look closer you notice that it hides a
rather wide crack in the cliff. Maybe if you remove the bush
you can squeeze in...?
You stand in a small clearing in the forest, near a small, steep cliff.
The cliffside is too steep to be climbed, and the forest surrounding
the clearing is far to dense to make your way through. Only to the south
the trees spread out enough to make room for a narrow path. A large bush
grows rather misplaced up against the cliff.
50589.name: The {gD{8ee{gp{8es{gt {GF{gorest{x by a {rCave{x

description: The broad path makes a big bend around a small lake here.
You can see the lake through the trees to the southwest.
The path goes on between the trees to the south and west.
50531.name: A Well-traveled {yPath{x

description: The path bends with the silent floating river and leads east
and south between the trees here. To the south is the outskirts
of the forest and to the north bushes block your way.
50579.name: On a {yPath {xnear {cD{8e{Bli{wm{Bbi{8y{cr{x

description: The holes gives good support as you climb the cliffside,
but they are slippery and it's a long way down... It's a
long way up too for that matter...
50548.name: Climbing a {cSteep {rCliff{x

description: The river Delimbiyr flows close to the forest here and the path
goes along its north bank and leads east and west. The river flows
silently by and runs in between the trees further to the east.
50577.name: On a {yPath {xnear {cD{8e{Bli{wm{Bbi{8y{cr{x

description: The river Delimbiyr flows close to the forest here and the path
goes along its north bank and leads east and west. The river flows
silently by and runs in between the trees further to the east.
50576.name: The Southern Outskirts of {GA{grd{yee{gp {GF{gorest{x

description: The old trail leads in a straight north-south direction.
To the north you see a steep cliff peaking up above the
tree tops and it looks like the path ends there.
50546.name: A {GF{gorest {yTrail{x

description: You are in the outskirts of the Ardeep forest, near The Trade Way,
wich lies to the northwest. The forest is light here, with only
bushes and an occasional tree, but to the east and south the trees
are much denser and blocks your way completely.
50502.name: The Northern Outskirts of {GA{grd{yee{gp {GF{gorest{x

description: The path leads east and west along the outskirts of the Ardeep
forest, and far to the southeast you catch a glimpse of the river
Delimbiyr flowing slowly towards the forest. The trees to the north
seems to make a solid wall that blocks your way.
50542.name: The Southern Outskirts of {GA{grd{yee{gp {GF{gorest{x

description: You are in the outskirts of the Ardeep forest, near The Trade Way,
wich lies to the west. The forest is light here, with only bushes
and an occasional tree, and to the east a path leads into the
depths of the forest
50568.name: The Northern Outskirts of {GA{grd{yee{gp {GF{gorest{x

description: You are in the outskirts of the Ardeep forest, near The Trade Way,
wich lies to the west. The forest is light here, with only bushes
and an occasional tree, but to the east the trees are much denser
and blocks your way completely.
50501.name: The Northern Outskirts of {GA{grd{yee{gp {GF{gorest{x

description: Although small, this home is larger than the other houses,
and looks more richly decorated. It must be inhabited by
the chief or elder of the elven village.
50595.name: Within a {mLarge {gEl{Gve{wn {RH{rome{x

description: The path makes a big bend here, going around the trunk of a
giant old oaktree, and leads east and north from here.
The sounds of the forest are everywhere around you, and you
sometimes spot animals moving betweeen the trees.
50513.name: A {yPath {xinto the {GF{gorest{x

description: The path leads west along the riverbank and to the north it parts
with the river and trails off into the forest. Nearby to the north
the dark forest seems to pull back from the path a bit.
50583.name: On a {yPath {xnear {cD{8e{Bli{wm{Bbi{8y{cr{x

description: The path leads north and south along the outskirts of the Ardeep forest.
To the west you can see the Trade Way not far away and to the east a
wall of trees blocks your way.
50504.name: The Outskirts of {GA{grd{yee{gp {GF{gorest{x

description: The path leads north and south along the outskirts of the Ardeep forest.
To the west you can see the Trade Way not far away and to the east a
wall of trees blocks your way.
50509.name: The Outskirts of {GA{grd{yee{gp {GF{gorest{x

description: The trail goes in a straight east-west direction through the
dense forest. The forest seems quite dark here, ancient trees
lean hout over the path casting deep shadows. You can hear the
sounds of animals rummaging about between the trees. To the west
the trail seems to split into two paths.
50563.name: {gD{8ee{gp {xinto the {GF{gorest{x

description: In a open clearing in the deep of the forest lies a large meadow,
covered with colorful flowers. Near the edge of the forest grows
large bushes carrying sweet and nutritous berries. Many kinds of
animals play or prey here, the entire meadow is filled with life.
50521.name: A {GF{gorest {wC{clearin{wg{x

description: You are in the outskirts of the Ardeep forest, near The Trade Way,
wich lies to the west. The forest is light here, with only bushes
and an occasional tree, the way seems open to the east and south
along the forest.
50503.name: The Northern Outskirts of {GA{grd{yee{gp {GF{gorest{x

description: The path bends here and leads west and north. Gigantic old
trees lean over the path, but not so much that they don't
let light through. To the south and east the trees makes a
solid wall that blocks you way. Nearby to the north the
forest looks lighter and you see a large clearing.
50525.name: A Well-traveled {yPath{x

description: The path leads north and south along the outskirts of the Ardeep forest.
To the west you can see the Trade Way not far away and to the east a
wall of trees blocks your way.
50510.name: The Outskirts of {GA{grd{yee{gp {GF{gorest{x

description: You are in the outskirts of the Ardeep forest, near The Trade Way,
wich lies to the west. The forest is light here, with only bushes
and an occasional tree, and to the east the trees makes way for a
broad path leading deeper into the forest.
50536.name: The Outskirts of {GA{grd{yee{gp {GF{gorest{x

description: A broad path goes between the trees here, leading north into
Ardeep or west towards the outskirts of the forest. The path
looks well travelled and it's easy to make your way here.
To the east and south a thick wall of trees blocks the way.
50534.name: A Well-traveled {yPath{x

description: This path looks well-kept, like it's cleared and maintained
on a regular basis. It makes a sharp bend here and leads the
west and south. Birdsong and the sound of numerous small and
larger animals can be heard from the forest near you.
50570.name: A {yPath {xthrough the {GF{gorest{x

description: The path splits up here. A narrow short path leads south to a
large clearing and a very faint trail leads east into the depths
of the woods.
50519.name: A {rFork {xin the {yPath{x

description: The trail goes in a straight east-west direction here. The forest
seems quite dark here, ancient trees lean hout over the path
casting deep shadows. You can hear the sounds of animals rummaging
about between the trees. There is no way of knowing what kind of
beasts are lurking in there... To the east the forest is lighter,
but to the west lies only more darkness...
50560.name: {gD{8ee{gp {xinto the {GF{gorest{x

description: The trail forks here. A well-kept path trails off between
two huge oaks to the north. To the east is a narrower path
wich seems to lead deeper into the woods. The path to the
south seems well traveled and looks quite broad.
50564.name: A {rFork {xin the {yTrail{x

description: In a open clearing in the deep of the forest lies a large meadow,
covered with colorful flowers. Near the edge of the forest grows
large bushes carrying sweet and nutritous berries. Many kinds of
animals play or prey here, the entire meadow is filled with life.
50522.name: A {GF{gorest {wC{clearin{wg{x

description: The trail curves, leading east and south. The forest is dark
here and the trail is overgrown with bushes and it's hard to
make your way. The sounds of the forest are everywhere around
you, and you sometimes spot animals moving betweeen the trees.
50553.name: {gD{8ee{gp {xinto the {GF{gorest{x

description: The path bends around the edge of the forest and leads north and west,
and the busy Trade Way can be seen through the bushes to the northeast.
To the east a path leads off between the trees into the depths of the
forest.
50505.name: The Outskirts of {GA{grd{yee{gp {GF{gorest{x

description: In a open clearing in the deep of the forest lies a large meadow,
covered with colorful flowers. Near the edge of the forest grows
large bushes carrying sweet and nutritous berries. Many kinds of
animals play or prey here, the entire meadow is filled with life.
50523.name: A {GF{gorest {wC{clearin{wg{x

description: Steep as a wall, the cliffside raises up through the treetops.
The path ends here, but when you examine the cliff closer you
notice holes carved in the rock so that it can be climbed as
easy as a ladder. The holes are smooth and rounded from long
time use, but the moss growing in them suggests that they
haven't been used in a while.
50547.name: Before a {cSteep {rCliff{x

description: The forest is not so dense here and the path leads to the west
and east. To the east the forest looks darker and thicker and
the path makes a sharp turn southward. To the west you see a
large sunny clearing in the forest.
50586.name: The {gD{8ee{gp{8es{gt {GF{gorest{x near a {wC{clearin{wg{x

description: This path looks well-kept, like it's cleared and maintained
on a regular basis. It makes a sharp bend here and leads the
north and east. Birdsong and the sound of numerous small and
larger animals can be heard from the forest near you.
50571.name: A {yPath {xthrough the {GF{gorest{x

description: You are in the outskirts of the Ardeep forest, near The Trade Way,
wich lies to the west. The forest is light here, with only bushes
and an occasional tree, the way seems open to the east and south
along the forest.
50506.name: The Outskirts of {GA{grd{yee{gp {GF{gorest{x

description: This large clearing lies deep in the darkest forest, surrounded
by dense ancient trees casting deep shadows. Although you'd expect
such a open place to be a little lighter than between the trees,
it is not... The area is barren and not much grow here and it has
as gloomy feel to it.
50557.name: A {wC{clearin{wg {xin the {gD{8ar{gk {GF{gorest{x

description: This is a small wooden house inhabitet by a elven family.
It is sparsly decorated but looks very comfortable and
cozy. The people who live here most likely make their
living from hunting in the forest and a bit of farming.
50593.name: Within an {gEl{Gve{wn {RH{rome{x

description: The village is hardly developed, as large trees encompass homes and the
road. The residence are very close to nature as suggested by how thick
they keep the forest here. The sounds of village life are all around,
yet scarcely do the numbers of villagers visible fit the volume of voices
heard. The village path continues north and south.
50574.name: A {yDirt Path {xthrough the Village{x

description: The trail leads in a straight north-south direction through
the deep forest. Trees surround you on all sides and in the
deep shadows you hear the sounds of the wild animals who
have their home here.
50550.name: {gD{8ee{gp {xinto the {GF{gorest{x

description: The trail curves again here, going north and west. The forest
is dark and the trail is overgrown with bushes and it's hard
to make your way. Trees surround you on all sides and in the
deep shadows you hear the sounds of the wild animals who
have their home here.
50552.name: {gD{8ee{gp {xinto the {GF{gorest{x

description: The forest is not so dense here and a faint path seems to trail
off between the trees to the east. It seems dark in there, and
the path doesn't seem to be used much. The main path goes on in
a north-south direction.
50584.name: Into the {gD{8ee{gp {GF{gorest{x

description: You manage to make your way through the bushes and find a little
known shortcut through the dark woods. Through the bushes to the
south you see a river and to the west lies a well travelled path.
50596.name: A {8Dark {rCut-through{x

description: The Trail makes a bend here, leading west towards the edge
of the forest or north deeper into the woods. It looks like
it's used regulary and is quite broad and easy to travel.
50566.name: A {yTrail {xthrough the {GF{gorest{x

description: The path leads east and west along the outskirts of the Ardeep
forest, and not far to the south and east you can see the river
Delimbiyr flowing slowly towards the forest. The trees to the
north seems to make a solid wall that blocks your way.
50543.name: The Southern Outskirts of {GA{grd{yee{gp {GF{gorest{x

description: The path makes a big bend here, going around the trunk of a
giant old oaktree, and leads west and north from here.
The sounds of the forest are everywhere around you, and you
sometimes spot animals moving betweeen the trees.
50514.name: A {yPath {xinto the {GF{gorest{x

description: In a open clearing in the deep of the forest lies a large meadow,
covered with colorful flowers. Near the edge of the forest grows
large bushes carrying sweet and nutritous berries. Many kinds of
animals play or prey here, the entire meadow is filled with life.
50524.name: A {GF{gorest {wC{clearin{wg{x

description: This is the entrance to a small elven village deep in the Ardeep
forest. A simple dirtroad leads north between the village houses,
and to the east lies the path into the forest. Sounds of a busy
village can be heard from the north.
50573.name: A {yDirt Path {xinto an {gEl{Gve{wn {WVi{wll{Gag{ge{x

description: The path bends with the silent floating river and leads east
and south between the trees. Further south the river seems to
turn westward again. The thick forest that lines the path seems
uninviting and dark.
50582.name: On a {yPath {xnear {cD{8e{Bli{wm{Bbi{8y{cr{x

description: The trail goes in a straight east-west direction, leading
west towards the outskirts of the forest or east deeper
into the woods. It looks like its used regulary and is
quite broad and easy to travel.
50567.name: A {yTrail {xthrough the {GF{gorest{x

description: The path leads straight forward in a east-west direction.
Gigantic old trees lean over the path, but not so much
that they don't let light through. To the north and south
the trees makes a solid wall that hinders you from leaving
the path.
50529.name: A Well-traveled {yPath{x

description: The path makes a big bend here, going around the trunk of a
giant old oaktree, and leads east and south from here.
The sounds of the forest are everywhere around you, and you
sometimes spot animals moving betweeen the trees.
50515.name: A {yPath {xinto the {GF{gorest{x

description: The path bends here and leads north and west. Gigantic old
trees lean over the path, but not so much that they don't
let light through. To the south the trees makes a solid wall
and to the west thick bushes blocks you way.
50527.name: A Well-traveled {yPath{x

description: This is a small wooden house inhabitet by a elven family.
It is sparsly decorated but looks very comfortable and
cozy. The people who live here most likely make their
living from hunting in the forest and a bit of farming.
50591.name: Within an {bEl{Bve{wn {RH{rome{x

description: The path leads east and west along the outskirts of the Ardeep
forest, and far to the southeast you catch a glimpse of the river
Delimbiyr flowing slowly towards the forest. The trees to the north

50540.name: The Southern Outskirts of {GA{grd{yee{gp {GF{gorest{x

description: This large clearing lies deep in the darkest forest, surrounded
by dense ancient trees casting deep shadows. Although you'd expect
such a open place to be a little lighter than between the trees,
it is not... The area is barren and not much grow here and it has
as gloomy feel to it.
50556.name: A {wC{clearin{wg {xin the {gD{8ar{gk {GF{gorest{x

description: The trail makes a bend here, leading east and south. The forest
seems quite dark here, ancient trees lean hout over the path
casting deep shadows. You can hear the sounds of animals rummaging
about between the trees. There is no way of knowing what kind of
beasts are lurking in there...
50561.name: {gD{8ee{gp {xinto the {GF{gorest{x

description: The path leads east and west along the outskirts of the Ardeep
forest, and far to the southeast you catch a glimpse of the river
Delimbiyr flowing slowly towards the forest. The trees to the north
seems to make a solid wall that blocks your way.
50541.name: The Southern Outskirts of {GA{grd{yee{gp {GF{gorest{x

50509.room_name: A regal {yea{Dg{yle {0flies high in the sky, guarding her {rnest{0.
50509.name: The {rF{Rur{Wi{Rou{rs {yEa{Dg{yle{0~

description:
He has a fair complexion, long thin hair that sparkles like silver, and
a tall, thin frame. He wears a bow and quiver of arrows, which gives
away his profession as a hunter.
50512.room_name: An {gel{Gve{Wn hu{Gnt{ger{x is here, spending time in his home.
50512.name: an {gel{Gve{Wn hu{Gnt{ger{x~

description:
She is a fair skinned woman of the elvish race. Her earthy garb and slightly
dark tone suggests she is a wood elf sub race, though it is difficult
to tell beneath her silvery veil.
50513.room_name: An {rel{Rve{Wn w{Rom{ran{x is here, at home with family.
50513.name: an {rel{Rve{Wn w{Rom{ran{x~

description: This child is happy here, playing amidst many simple toys.
50514.name: an {bel{Bve{Wn c{Bhi{bld{x~

description:
This elder is perhaps the leader of the tiny settlement here in the woods.
He has smile wrinkles at the corner of his eyes and carries a tough,
dark complexion that many centuries has given him. He enjoys his pipe,
and carrying on with good conversation amidst his people, and the occasional
visitor to his village.
50515.room_name: An {cel{Cde{Wrly {Cel{cf{x is here, smoking his long thin pipe.
50515.name: the {cel{Cve{Wn e{Cld{cer{x ~

description:
This servant wears simple clothing, and is indistinquisable from any
of the other elves, save the headband which tells what house he serves.
50516.room_name: An {yel{Yve{Wn ser{Yva{ynt{x is here, tending to the household.
50516.name: an {yel{Yve{Wn ser{Yva{ynt{x~

description:
This elf is much like the others in this area, with a fair complexion
and tall, thin frame.
50517.name: an {gel{Gve{wn {Wvil{wl{Gager{x~

description:
He's dressed mostly in black, and whatever isn't black is hidden
well by the shadows of his hiding place.  There's nothing nice to say
about this one.
50518.room_name: A {Dmasked {wrobber{0 is hiding in the bushes.
50518.name: The {DMasked {wRobber{0~

description:
He or she is a tiny fluttering pixie, dressed in forest clothing
and wielding a nasty looking rat sticker.  Judging by its grin, this
pixie is up to no good.
50519.room_name: A {Mp{Ci{Gx{Ri{Ye{x flutters about here with a devious grin.
50519.name: a {Rd{8e{rvio{8u{Rs {Mp{Ci{Gx{Ri{Ye{x~
